languages.text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель Ордо Ксенос, отдал жизнь, сражаясь с врагом Человечества — Вольным Торговцем фон Валанциус, предавш{mf|им|ей} Империум и склонивш{mf|имся|ейся} перед силами, враждебными Человечеству.
languages.translation_comment:
Если Хейнрикс погиб на Эпитафии, бросив игрока хаосита
ИЛИ
Был в ростере и игрок поклонился Ктану и романс не зафинален по хидден пасу

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.
languages.original_text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель Ордо Ксенос, отдал жизнь, сражаясь с врагом Человечества — Вольным Торговцем фон Валанциус, предавш{mf|им|ей} Империум и склонивш{mf|имся|ейся} перед силами, враждебными Человечеству.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, the Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — a von Valancius Rogue Trader, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed before the powers opposing Mankind.

Heinrix van Calox, the Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — a von Valancius Rogue Trader, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed before the powers opposing Mankind.
Heinrix van Calox, the Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed before Mankind's enemy.

Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.

Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.

languages.text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，异形审判庭的审讯官，与人类之敌进行了战斗。冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人背叛了帝国，向人类之敌俯首称臣，而海因里希为了消灭帝国的宿敌，在战斗中壮烈牺牲。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.

traits.locale_text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，异形审判庭的审讯官，与人类之敌进行了战斗。冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人背叛了帝国，向人类之敌俯首称臣，而海因里希为了消灭帝国的宿敌，在战斗中壮烈牺牲。

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, der Interrogator der Ordo Xenos, gab sein Leben im Kampf gegen den Feind der Menschheit — gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} von Valancius, {mf|der|die} das Imperium verraten und sich den Feinden der Menschheit angeschlossen hatte.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, der Interrogator der Ordo Xenos, gab sein Leben im Kampf gegen den Feind der Menschheit — gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} von Valancius, {mf|der|die} das Imperium verraten und sich dem Feind angeschlossen hatte.

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, interrogateur de l'Ordo Xénos, donna sa vie en luttant contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius, qui avait trahi l'Imperium en se soumettant aux ennemis de l'humanité.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, interrogateur de l'Ordo Xénos, donna sa vie en luttant contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius, qui avait trahi l'Imperium en jurant allégeance aux ennemis de l'humanité.

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, el interrogador del Ordo Xenos, dio su vida en la lucha contra {mf|el enemigo|la enemiga} de la Humanidad: {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, que traicionó al Imperium y se arrodilló ante las fuerzas que lo asolan.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, el interrogador del Ordo Xenos, dio su vida en la lucha contra {mf|el enemigo|la enemiga} de la Humanidad: {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, que traicionó al Imperium y se arrodilló ante sus enemigos.

languages.text: 〈純血の団〉のインテロゲイターだったハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、人類の敵との戦いに生涯を捧げた。帝国を裏切り人類の敵に屈従した自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスその人を討つために。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.

traits.locale_text: 〈純血の団〉のインテロゲイターだったハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、人類の敵との戦いに生涯を捧げた。帝国を裏切り人類の敵に屈従したローグトレーダー、フォン・ヴァランシウスその人を討つために。

languages.text: Zeno Nizamı Sorgucusu Heinrix Van Calox; İmparatorluk'a ihanet ederek İnsanlığın düşmanı olan güçlere diz çöken ve onlardan birine dönüşen Hür Tacir von Valancius'a karşı savaşırken hayatını kaybetti.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, gave his life fighting the enemy of Humanity — Rogue Trader von Valancius, who betrayed the Imperium and bowed down before forces hostile to Mankind.

traits.locale_text: Zeno Nizamı Sorgucu'su Heinrix Van Calox, İnsanlığın düşmanına, İmparatorluk'a ihanet ederek İnsan ırkının karşısındaki güçlere diz çöken Hür Tacir von Valancius'a karşı savaşırken hayatını kaybetti.

languages.translation_comment:
Если Хейнрикс погиб на Эпитафии, бросив игрока хаосита
ИЛИ
Был в ростере и игрок поклонился Ктану и романс не зафинален по хидден пасу
